ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for a RequestGroup resource.

RequestGroup.Name: RequestGroup
RequestGroup.Description: An instance of the R4 RequestGroup FHIR resource.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: Reference to the MedicationRequest or ServiceRequest resource.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: For oncology RequestGroup, this always equals "plan".

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Plan/cycle status value. Supported values include:
  • Planned
  • Scheduled
  • Completed
  • Deleted
  • Started
  • Canceled
  • Given Externally
  • Unscheduled
  • Non-Treatment Orders

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this care plan.
